start.speaker: kiupita
start.text: Thanks for meeting me here. I wanted to talk to you about something.

scene_02.speaker: kiupita
scene_02.text: This year has been amazing because of you. You've become one of my closest friends.

scene_03.speaker: kiupita
scene_03.text: I had some deeper feelings developing, but I think I understand where we stand.

scene_04.speaker: kiupita
scene_04.text: And that's okay! Having you as a close friend means the world to me.

scene_05.text: You talk under the stars for hours...

scene_06.speaker: kiupita
scene_06.text: Promise me we'll stay friends, even after graduation?

scene_07.text: You promise, knowing this friendship will last forever.

future.speaker: kiupita
future.text: I'm so glad we stayed in touch. You're still one of my best friends!

final.text: CLOSE FRIENDS ENDING - You formed a lifelong friendship that will endure anything.
